description:
This course can help food business owners to successfully market their business. We apply these strategies to four basic areas in the food industry: Food Publishing, Specialty Food, Mobile Food, and Food Business Showcase.

The course consists of 14 lessons via video with supplemental material that you can download to use for your business. The course covers immediate income solutions ranging from list-building to learning how to track your marketing efforts to determine desired results .

Consider this a continuing education class. Education in the food business is not easily accessible for business owners. This course and subsequent courses in this field can fill the gaps and help you operate your business successfully.
title: Food Business Marketing Institute
